the size of your hook to adjust if necessary finished pattern is written for newborn size with larger sizes following in parentheses size changes are written in parentheses as follows baby toddler child tween adult small adult large sizes when selecting a size choose based on the actual head circumference and not the person s age the ribbing is very stretchy plan for negative ease of about 1 5 /4 cm for sizes newborn to child and about 2 5 /6 5 cm for bigger sizes be sure to account for this stretch
